title: How to Make a Quick Microwaved Pita Bread "Pizza"

steps.headline: Prepare the pita bread.
steps.description: Use a pita bread as the base instead of regular pizza dough. Place the pita bread on a plate.

steps.headline: Spread the sauce.
steps.description: Get the tomato sauce and spread it on the pizza base using a spoon.

steps.headline: Add any type of your favorite toppings on the pizza.
steps.description: Consider adding mushrooms, tomatoes, peppers, cheese, pepperoni, bacon, olives, garlic powder, etc. Check out other pizza toppings online. This can give you more ideas and variations to the pizza. If you want, have a garlic crust. Sprinkle garlic powder on the edges of the pita bread.

steps.headline: Place the pizza in the microwave.
steps.description: Warm up the pizza for about a minute, until the cheese melts and the toppings slightly soften.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: Remove the pizza from the microwave using cooking mitts. Slice the pizza in triangular slices. Enjoy!

text: Prepare the pita bread. Use a pita bread as the base instead of regular pizza dough. Place the pita bread on a plate. Spread the sauce. Get the tomato sauce and spread it on the pizza base using a spoon. Add any type of your favorite toppings on the pizza. Consider adding mushrooms, tomatoes, peppers, cheese, pepperoni, bacon, olives, garlic powder, etc. Check out other pizza toppings online. This can give you more ideas and variations to the pizza. If you want, have a garlic crust. Sprinkle garlic powder on the edges of the pita bread. Place the pizza in the microwave. Warm up the pizza for about a minute, until the cheese melts and the toppings slightly soften. Serve. Remove the pizza from the microwave using cooking mitts. Slice the pizza in triangular slices. Enjoy!
